name: Explode
description: So simple that it's arguably not even a Spell but rather a premeditated failure of catastrophic proportions. The wizard causes a one cubic metre object to explode and deal Damage to everyone within 24 metres depending on proximity. Those within 6 metres take Damage as a Gigantic Beast, within 12 as a Large Beast, 18 as a Modest Beast and 24 as a Small Beast.
casting_instructions: Explode 1 cubic metre object - damage by proximity: 6m=Gigantic Beast, 12m=Large Beast, 18m=Modest Beast, 24m=Small Beast
